name: A Little Truck in Action Free: 3D Camion Driving Game with Funny Cars for Kids
name_original: A Little Truck in Action Free: 3D Camion Driving Game with Funny Cars for Kids
description:
There are plenty of free transport games around. Different vehicles, different cities await you and your kid. We decided to do something different. A free 3D city transport vehicle game for kids!
Of course trucks are involved. Of course machines, vehicles, cars are included. And the most important - the city is included too. With all roads, crossroads, traffic etc. It's a complete package. A real city transport vehicle game. A real game with powerful machines. All in beautifully crafted 3D and all is intended to Kids who loves vehicles and love machines.
Maybe it's the best driver game for kids, at least is intended to be and is intended to fulfill the dreams of kids for machines and vehicles.
The vehicles in glorious 3D, the transport machines (also in beautiful 3D) are included to be driven by your kids, the game is not only cute but free, the city “never sleeps”, so the transport is continuous - nobody can wish for more from a free 3D city transport vehicle game for kids.

Features
- Unique driving experience with alternate controls. Controls are switchable.
- Special challenges, as High Traffic, Crossroads, Moving Machinery, other obstacles...
- You can level up in 5 different areas to earn extra profits and proof your driving skills
- Beautifully crafted 3D Cartoon environment
- Different trucks to drive with unique Settings for better driving experience
- Customizable gameplay with numerous upgrades
- Lots of different power-ups
